hero.tagline: WordPress Plugin Developer • PHP & JavaScript Specialist • 150+ Plugins

about.title: About Me
introduction: Hi there! I'm Dev Kabir, a WordPress plugin developer with 4+ years of experience. I design and ship production-ready plugins that improve performance, automate workflows, and unlock new revenue for businesses.

I work with PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MySQL, and the WordPress ecosystem, building WooCommerce integrations and REST APIs. On Fiverr, I've completed 38+ projects with a 5-star rating. I'm currently learning Rust to deepen my systems programming skills.

experience.description: Led a Vue 2 to Vue 3 (Composition API) migration across 60K+ lines of a production plugin, improving maintainability and upgrade velocity. Contributed to Defender and Beehive and shipped releases through a CI/CD pipeline with rigorous peer review.
Built and maintained a CORS error-solving plugin adopted by 6,000+ websites worldwide, with clear documentation and long-term support for open-source users.

Delivered 38+ custom WordPress plugins with consistent 5-star ratings. Specialized in WooCommerce integrations using REST APIs to connect payment gateways, shipping providers, CRMs, and analytics platforms.

projects.title: CORS Error Solver
projects.description: A WordPress plugin that eliminates CORS issues and powers 6,000+ live websites worldwide.

projects.title: WooCommerce Integrations
projects.description: Custom WooCommerce plugins for payment gateways, shipping methods, and inventory management across 38+ client projects.

projects.title: Custom Plugin Suite

projects.title: CI/CD Automation
